General.Name: T.R.V. Rubber Products PCL
General.Description: T.R.V. Rubber Products Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes molded rubber products. It provides molded rubber products in automobiles, including rubber hoses, electrical conduits, rubber gaskets, rubber o-rings, rubber balls, rubber seals, brake pad rubber products, anti-slip rubber mats, etc. The company also offers molded rubber parts in electrical appliances comprising rubber parts in rice cookers, water pumps, washing machines, vacuum cleaners, microwaves, compressors, fridges, air filters, etc. In addition, it provides other molded rubber parts, such as rubber parts in agricultural machinery, plumbing, etc. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
